charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through the woods, Bede called out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1101_0200_2:
Bede and Iron Valiant’s eyes had a
menacing glint as they stared
[Name:PlayerNickname ] down.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_0300_1:
Like a moth to the flame, or so the
saying goes.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_0400_1:
Let me see if Iron Valiant’s blades can cut
you down.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0301_0500_1:
You mean you want to train
with me?
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0401_0600_1: Correct. I’m glad you’re quick on the uptake.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0402_0800_1: Don’t be silly. I don’t want to hurt you.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0402_0900_1: I just need an opponent to train with.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1000_1:
People say Iron Valiant is a Pokémon from
the future.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1100_1:
I don’t know much about it, much less how
much power it may have hidden within.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1200_1:
But the more we battle, the more data
I have to work with.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0301_1300_1: Are you curious about the future?
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0302_1500_1:
Do you really think it came from the
future?
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_0402_1600_1: My, my. You sure get caught up in details.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1700_1:
Even if Iron Valiant IS from the future,
it won’t pose much problem for me.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1800_1:
My priority is to understand it better—so I
can draw out more of its power!
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_1900_1:
What matters to me is that it performs well
as my partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2000_1: Everything else is just for show.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2100_1: You seem quite curious about the future.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2200_1:
But it’s not for us to know, no matter how
hard we try.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2300_1:
We live in the present—there’s no
changing that.
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2400_1: However, one thing I DO know is...
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2500_1:
a bright future awaits me and Iron Valiant
now that we’re a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2700_1: Iron Valiant is ready. Can we begin?
charaepi_ch0246_10_beet/2301_1201_2800_1: Come now—and taste what we can do!
